steamdown.msg1: The Steam Community is currently down
steamdown.msg2: We were unable to get your ID based on what you entered.
steamdown.msg3: Please enter your STEAM:0:0:00000 ID or wait untill Steam comes back online
steamdown.msg4: Sorry we were unable to get your Steam ID.
steamdown.msg5: You probably entered an incorrect Steam ID
steamdown.msg6: Please check and make sure you entered a valid Steam ID and try again.

donate.msg2: Welcome back %s your current donor perks expire on
donate.msg3: Sorry, the minimum donation that can be processed is $%s. Please adjust accordingly.
donate.msg4: Please make sure this is you!
donate.msg5: You wish to donate $%s. For your generosity, you will receive %s days of perks
donate.msg7a: your perks will be extended until %s
donate.msg8: Please select the colors and tag you would like to use for your in-game chat.
donate.msg9: If this is you, and you agree please click below, to proceed with your donation, you will be redirected to PayPal to process your contribution.
donate.msg10: I understand that I am chaning my level from %s to %s
donate.changePerks: It appears you are trying to change your perks from %s level to %s level, your expiration date has be prorated. If this is not your intent, please go back and try again.
donate.downgrade: It appears you are trying to downgrade your perks from %s level to %s level. If this is your intent, your expiration date will be recalculated retroactively at the %s rate, otherwise please go back and try again.
donate.acceptTos: I accept the Terms and conditions
